Nevexyl, officially the Nevexylan Empire, is an isolated nation situated on the (PENINSULA NAME). Nevexyl borders Name Pending to the North, Erothena to the East, and Ashuneria to the South. The nation is made up of an area of 514,116 square kilometers, consisting mainly of ashlands within the its borders and hints of tropical savanna on the outskirts. (HEAVY WIP)
